title: Elmore Leonard: La Brava; Cat Chaser; Split Images
description: Three Complete NovelsFrom "the best American writer of crime fiction alive" (Newsweek), three thrilling, bestselling mysteries in one hardcover volume. La Brava, Cat Chaser , and Split Images received rave reviews and make it clear why this New York Times bestselling author has been hailed coast to coast as the hottest thriller writer of our time.
author: Elmore Leonard
